scripts.test:headed: if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then echo 'Headed tests are not available in CI environments. Use test:headless instead.'; exit 0; else playwright test --project=chromium-headed --headed; fi
scripts.test:ui: playwright test tests/ui-headless.spec.js && if [ "$CI" != "true" ]; then playwright test tests/ui-headed.spec.js; fi
